channel.title: Hedo Laki? Latua Katualawhateverthefuckitis?
channel.description:
I know many of our members here go on YouTube to watch other people capture their indignity and post it for the world to see. I'm sure all of you also leave comments, taking the indignity even furthur. And I'm also sure you see things like:
In 1932 A Girl was Raped And She Said Hei Do Laki Before She DIed. IF Dont Repost This In 5 Topics She Will Appear By Your Bed With Glowing Red Eyes And Stare At You Until YOu Fall ASleep
And on.
What I was thinking is that a lot of noobs for some reason feel obliged to spread this nonsense. What I was also thinking was that it could be utilized as a great Advertising campaign. We have a lot of active members here so maybe we can start a new thing like that. Something along the lines of:
Sorry I'm a retarded noob but if I don't repost I'm gonna get runover by an Orange Bulldozer.
"There was a 10 year old kid named tsebehtsirapom, he visited a site called www.moparisthebest.com. There he found a lot of cheats for online games. He got so good he kept using the cheats and become rich. He played online so much he eventually died. If you don't repost this message he will appear beside you when you surf the net and curse you so that the next time you go outside an Orange Bulldozer will hit you."
It's a crazy scheme from a crazy guy but hey the hell if it works :)
~ VG

item.title: Hedo Laki? Latua Katualawhateverthefuckitis?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:9, topic:52112”]I’ve got no soul, should have died 3 times and still I’m waiting for 9 inevitable (late) phone calls from people telling me they love me.

The moral of this message is, all of this stuff is bullcrap. :)[/quote]

LIES!!

Read full topic

item.title: Hedo Laki? Latua Katualawhateverthefuckitis?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

In 1945, a young girl named katu lata kulu came over to America in a grey boat from Africa. A mysterious man killed her by cutting the word “LATUALATUKA” into her back. now that you have read this measge she will come to your house on a full moon and steal your soul unless you follow these directions:

  1. Retype this message as a comment for three other videos

item.title: Hedo Laki? Latua Katualawhateverthefuckitis?
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:2, topic:52112”]For posting something as gay as this I’m going to Whois your IP find out where you live and run your whole damn family over with an orange bulldozer.

Whoever asked you to post this just fucked you over![/quote]

[hidefrom93dcthugs93] The old freaky man named 93dcthugs93 asked me to! [/hidefrom93dcthugs93]

To tell you the truth, this was more of a plan to see if it would actually catch on than rather get more recruits. The recruits are just the fringe benefits.

BTW I’m on a WiFi network. So the pleasure is all yours in mauling my neighbor. I was gonna hire a Hitman to do it anyway.

Read full topic
